info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: A Wee Witch
Laetitia
collection.openText: She was so sad that she had to leave her dear friends behind, so she came up with a brilliant idea!

observe.desc: [ {I hope to find lots of friends here too! The kid is shy, so the gift will be given in secret! Farewells are sad, I hope we can play more! And people here don't smile! That looks so gloomy! So this little lady has made a decision! To stay here and never leave until laughter is restored to this place! I will be happy if everyone is pleased with my pranks!} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Normal, $0 gave a heartfelt gift to #0.
When #0 was assigned to work with a different Abnormality instead of $0, a ███████ eventually burst out of their body at a certain point.
When the assignment was canceled before the ███████ was born, nothing strange occurred to the employee’s body.
